name: Backend Developer
description:
Roadmap:
1. Learn Python fundamentals and OOP
2. Study Data Structures & Algorithms
3. Build REST APIs using FastAPI/Flask
4. Work with SQL & NoSQL databases
5. Implement authentication (JWT)
6. Containerize using Docker
7. Deploy to AWS/Render

Technologies:
- Python
- FastAPI/Flask
- PostgreSQL/MySQL
- MongoDB
- JWT
- Docker
- AWS

name: Fullstack Developer
description:
Roadmap:
1. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript
2. Build UI using React
3. Develop backend APIs (Node.js/FastAPI)
4. Connect frontend & backend
5. Integrate databases
6. Deploy full applications

Technologies:
- HTML
- CSS
- JavaScript
- React
- Node.js/FastAPI
- PostgreSQL/MongoDB
- Vercel/AWS

name: Data Scientist
description:
Roadmap:
1. Learn Python for data analysis
2. Study statistics & probability
3. Use Pandas & NumPy
4. Perform data visualization
5. Build ML models using Scikit-learn
6. Work on real datasets

Technologies:
- Python
- Pandas
- NumPy
- Matplotlib
- Scikit-learn
- SQL

name: ML Engineer
description:
Roadmap:
1. Master ML fundamentals
2. Learn Deep Learning frameworks
3. Optimize & evaluate models
4. Deploy models via APIs
5. Understand MLOps practices

Technologies:
- Python
- TensorFlow/PyTorch
- Scikit-learn
- Docker
- FastAPI
- AWS/GCP

name: DevOps Engineer
description:
Roadmap:
1. Learn Linux & networking basics
2. Set up CI/CD pipelines
3. Containerize using Docker
4. Orchestrate with Kubernetes
5. Manage cloud infrastructure

Technologies:
- Linux
- Bash
- GitHub Actions/Jenkins
- Docker
- Kubernetes
- AWS/Azure

name: Mobile App Developer
description:
Roadmap:
1. Learn Dart & Flutter or Native Android/iOS
2. Build UI components
3. Connect to backend APIs
4. Use Firebase
5. Deploy to app stores

Technologies:
- Dart/Flutter
- Kotlin/Swift
- Firebase
- REST APIs

name: Cloud Engineer
description:
Roadmap:
1. Understand cloud fundamentals
2. Deploy infrastructure on AWS/Azure/GCP
3. Manage containers
4. Automate with Terraform
5. Implement security best practices

Technologies:
- AWS/Azure/GCP
- Docker
- Kubernetes
- Terraform

name: Cybersecurity Analyst
description:
Roadmap:
1. Learn networking fundamentals
2. Understand vulnerabilities
3. Practice penetration testing
4. Monitor security events
5. Study incident response

Technologies:
- Linux
- Wireshark
- Metasploit
- SIEM Tools
- Python
